Resume.File Name: Angelo_Esmeralda_{Company Name}_{Role if it's not long}_Resume
Resume.Job Title Note: Only use professional experiences for Job1Title and Job2Title

CoverLetter.File Name: Angelo_Esmeralda_{Company Name}_{Role if it's not long}_Cover_Letter

Job.Description: 2-3 Sentences explaining the position and company.
Job.Job Quality: A number on a scale from 1 to 10 on how good the job sounds in terms of work life balance, learning opportunity, work culture, red/green flags in the job description, and how well the things I learn from this job will transfer over to other better jobs. Can be a float
Job.Job Quality Description: Explanation of why the job quality was given that rating.
Job.Motive: Reason why I should be interested in this job opportunity in first person or my point of view.
Job.Match Rating: Rating out of 10 and only the numerator. In number type and it can be a float value
Job.Match Rating Description: Reason for choosing the match rating
Job.Expected Response Date: mm/dd/yy of when I should stop waiting for a response. Keep in mind the date posted (if it was given in the prompt)
